Package com.projectps.buildingmanagement.services

Class OfferService

java.lang.Object
com.projectps.buildingmanagement.services.OfferService
@Service public class OfferService extends Object
This service class provides various functionalities related to property offers.

      the created offer DTO

    • updateOffer

      public OfferDTO updateOffer(UUID id, OfferDTO offerDTO) throws OfferNotFoundException
      Updates an offer by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the offer to update
      offerDTO - the offer DTO containing updated offer information
      Returns:
      the updated offer DTO
      Throws:
      OfferNotFoundException - if the offer is not found
      PropertyNotFoundException - if the property associated with the offer is not found

    • deleteOffer

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      OfferNotFoundException - if the offer is not found
      PropertyNotFoundException - if the property associated with the offer is not found
